aliens.name: Cosmic Entity
aliens.description: A mysterious being with the power to bend space and time. This alien can manipulate the fabric of reality to their advantage.
aliens.power: Once per turn, can move one of their ships to any planet.

aliens.name: Void Nomad
aliens.description: Ancient travelers of the void between stars. They have learned to exist in the harshest environments of space.
aliens.power: Ships can never be removed from the game and always return to home planets.

aliens.name: Star Devourer
aliens.description: A species that evolved to consume stellar energy. Their appetite for stars is legendary across the galaxy.
aliens.power: Can sacrifice a ship to gain an additional action during their turn.

aliens.name: Quantum Hivemind
aliens.description: A collective consciousness that exists simultaneously across multiple dimensions and timelines.
aliens.power: Can see one card from opponent's hand before battles.

aliens.name: Nebula Ghost
aliens.description: Ethereal entities born in the heart of nebulae. They can phase through solid matter and energy fields.
aliens.power: Ships can pass through obstacles and defensive structures.

aliens.name: Celestial Architect
aliens.description: Master builders who reshape celestial bodies according to their artistic vision and practical needs.
aliens.power: Can modify planet attributes once per game.
